attributes.review: I downloaded this app and was surprised that that this weird orange guy owns it. The funny thing is he doesn’t like anyone who’s not white when he’s not even white, he’s orange.

attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app it started tracking my location and data. He started sending me lewd texts 🥴 I did not feel safe 👁🙅👁

attributes.review: Dumb concept of an app asked for my phone number and a weird orange popped up on my screen 1/10 wouldn’t recommend to family or friends
attributes.title: Itchy nutsack

attributes.review: Trump is like scrappy doo. He acts all like mean and wants to “dominate” but he’s just a tiny little man with so much hate. Just a tiny little orange soccer ball shaped man who lies about everything and probably smells like self tanner and sweat.
attributes.title: Scrappy doo lookin

attributes.review: This app is awful it barley works and the advertisements are burning my eyes 😭   Hope it gets taken down and into the garbage disposal.    😘

attributes.review: You are trying to take an app down that had inspired millions to be confident and show their talents, but you don’t care about anyone but yourself. THATS ALL I HAVE TO SAY!
